name: Venture's Gauntlet VR
description:
Venture's Gauntlet VR is a thrilling, immersive adventure game set in breathtaking landscapes. Test your stamina, accuracy, wit and reflexes as you navigate treacherous terrain, solve puzzles, and navigate obstacles.

We introduce our unique TrueMotionVR movement mechanic, allowing you to walk and run through our immersive and realistic landscapes. Grab a bow and arrow to shoot down targets, use a shield to dodge turrets, climbing walls and ropes, and swing across ravines! Explore vast and stunning environments such as open highlands, caves, cliff edges and a castle; each jam-packed with its own unique puzzles and challenges.

Get ready to embark on the adventure of a lifetime!

Features

  • Awe-inspiring and varied locations. Will you explore or race through them?
  • High-end graphics and a diverse sound profile that allows for immersion into a natural environment.
  • Unique TrueMotionVR walking and running mechanic
  • A diverse set of interactions and mechanics such as climbing, cranks/elevators, archery, and more.
  • Dynamic calibration where the obstacles' height and width are adjusted to fit each user, including seated gameplay.
  • Various scenery, wildlife, natural elements, and matching sounds make you feel like you have travelled to a distant location.
  • Multiple levels that gradually increase in intensity and complexity.
  • Optimized for PCVR but runs on stand-alone systems via Link Cable or AirLink.
